snippet: Mike Kelley, the multi-media post-Conceptual artist with a punk rocker sensibility was found dead on Tuesday at his home in Los Angeles, Gagosian Gallery, his dealer, confirmed.
abstract: Mike Kelley, the multi-media post-Conceptual artist with a punk rocker sensibility was found dead on Tuesday at his home in Los Angeles, Gagosian Gallery, his dealer, confirmed.

headline.main: Mike Kelley, California Artist, An Apparent Suicide at 57
